aboutContent: Welcome to a world where learning meets adventure! With Sebi the Gazelle and friends, children aged 4 to 8 explore an interactive universe designed to spark curiosity and develop skills. Each game, activity, and story is crafted to offer a unique, fun, and enriching educational experience. Here, your children can grow and flourish in a safe environment, designed to fuel their imagination while entertaining them. Give them a new way to discover the joy of learning through play!

game1.title: The Adventures of James the Owl
game1.description: Sebi the gazelle invites you to play and count together! Her friend James the owl loves numbers. He will give you little math challenges, and you have to find the answer quickly before time runs out! The more points you get, the harder the questions become. Are you ready for the challenge?

game2.title: The Tricks of Drys the Squirrel
game2.description: Oh dear, Drys the squirrel is a little rascal who snacks in secret! Help Sebi the gazelle find the treats Drys has hidden under the cups! Can you guess where he put them? The more you progress, the faster the cups move. Are you up for the challenge?

1.message: ‚ÄúMy son really loved James' game! It‚Äôs amazing to see a game that stimulates his strategic mind while entertaining him. I highly recommend this to parents looking for a fun and educational experience.‚Äù

2.message: ‚ÄúSuper fun and well-designed, my kids love it!‚Äù

3.message: ‚ÄúI was skeptical, but very impressed by the educational aspect!‚Äù

sebi.name: Sebi the gazelle
sebi.description: Sebi the gazelle is a true adventurer, always ready to explore the world. A bit absent-minded, she sometimes runs into obstacles without realizing it, but she always keeps her energy and smile! With your help, she can jump higher and avoid everything in her path.

celia.name: C√©lia the parrot
celia.description: C√©lia the parrot is a sparkling and joyful friend, known for her rainbow-colored feathers and contagious laughter. But today, something‚Äôs wrong... Her feathers have lost their color and her smile has faded. Luckily, you're here to help! Grab your color palette and bring her vibrant feathers back to life.

charly.name: Charly the chameleon
charly.description: Charly the chameleon is a shy and quiet character, always ready to blend into his surroundings. With his ability to change colors, he loves to hide and go unnoticed. Despite his reserved nature, he enjoys playing hide and seek with friends ‚Äî and it's up to you to find him!

james.name: James the owl
james.description: James the owl is a clever little genius with a mischievous look. Passionate about numbers and riddles, he loves making his friends think. Always perched somewhere with a book under his wing, he shares his knowledge with humor and wit!

mel.name: Mel the marmot
mel.description: Mel the marmot is a calm explorer who loves digging long underground tunnels. But with so many secret paths, she sometimes gets lost! A bit scatterbrained but always well-meaning, Mel needs your help to find her way safely to the sunny meadows.

nour.name: Nour the nightingale
nour.description: Nour the nightingale is a cheerful bird passionate about singing ‚Äî sometimes a bit too loudly! With his melodic voice, he sings everywhere, even if it's a little too much for Sebi the gazelle's sensitive ears. Always eager to improve, Nour needs your help to sing in tune and create beautiful harmonies!

drys.name: Drys the squirrel
drys.description: Drys the squirrel is a clever little fellow always looking for new treats. Super agile, he loves hiding his goodies under cups and challenging his friends to find them. A real trickster, Drys is always up for a little mystery‚Ä¶ and he needs your help to remember where he hid everything!

noah.name: Noah the fox
noah.description: Noah the fox is a curious adventurer, always ready to explore new horizons. Passionate about geography, he dreams of learning everything about the world ‚Äî especially the regions of France! With his sharp mind and cleverness, Noah needs your help to meet the challenge and become a true expert.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Sebi la gazelle, we value the privacy and security of our users' personal data, especially when it comes to children. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.

1.title: 1. Collection of Personal Information
1.desc: We may collect certain personal information to enhance the user experience. This may include:
1.item1: The child's first name or nickname
1.item3: Feedback from parents on the games offered
1.note: No sensitive information such as address or precise location data is collected.

2.title: 2. Use of Information
2.desc: The collected information helps us to:
2.item1: Improve and personalize game content to make the experience more suitable for children
2.item2: Receive feedback from parents to develop new features

3.title: 3. Information Sharing
3.desc: The information collected is strictly confidential and not shared with third parties, except when necessary to provide the service (such as technical partners or secure hosting services).

4.title: 4. Information Security
4.desc: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction. For example, all sensitive information is stored securely and encrypted.

5.title: 5. User Rights
5.item1: Access information collected about their child
5.item2: Request modification or deletion of such information
5.note: To exercise these rights, please contact us at the following address:

6.title: 6. Changes to this Privacy Policy
6.desc: This privacy policy may be modified from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. We will inform you of any changes via contact@sebilagazelle.fr.

7.title: 7. Contact
7.desc: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy or how we handle personal data, feel free to contact us:

1.title: 1. Site Publisher
1.desc: The sebilagazelle.fr website is a school project developed as part of a university assignment. It is managed by a group of three students:
1.contact: For any questions or complaints, please contact us at:

2.title: 2. Hosting
2.host: The site is hosted by the following company:

3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
3.desc1: All content (texts, images, illustrations, graphics, audio, video, etc.) on this site is the exclusive property of the project authors or has been used with proper permissions in an educational context.
3.desc2: Any reproduction, distribution, or use without permission is prohibited, except for strictly personal and non-commercial use.

4.title: 4. Personal Data
4.desc1: This site does not collect sensitive personal data. Some information may be collected for educational purposes (nickname, age), but it is never shared with third parties. For more details, please consult our

5.title: 5. Cookies
5.desc: This site may use cookies to improve the user experience. No data is used for advertising or commercial purposes.

mainPage.title: The Secrets of Drys the Squirrel

drys_level_1_text: Help Drys find his hazelnut in the enchanted garden!
drys_level_2_text: The trees have moved! Find the right path.
drys_level_3_text: Watch out for brambles! You need to calculate to move forward.
drys_level_4_text: Leaves are falling... but where‚Äôs the hiding spot?
drys_level_5_text: It‚Äôs the final challenge! Are you ready for the leap?
drys_level_default_text: A new challenge awaits you with Drys!
